page.title: 12FARMING IN THE COTSWOLDS
page.content: {Half-Way Farm,}found on a hillside in Waterley Bottom covers twenty acres. The owners Mr and Mrs Harper have sixteen beef cattle,three horses,one sheep and some chickens.A day on the farm includes feeding the chickens, putting the sheep and cattle out to graze and grooming the horses. The greatest contribution to the farm's income comes from their business venture in working holidays, for people who would like to combine their holiday with an active experience of life on a small farm. Visitors can become involved in horse -riding and grooming,feeding chickens and dealing with the cattle.
